hero.headline: Guha Abahinzi Imbaraga n'Amakuru Ashingiye ku Makuru
hero.subHeadline: Tegura neza, usarure neza, kandi uhurire n'abaguzi. Farmlytics izana isesengura rya kijyambere ku murima wawe.

features.title: Ibyo Ukeneye Byose Kugirango Uterambere Umurima Wawe
features.subtitle: Ibikoresho byuzuye byakozwe ku bahinzi ba none kugirango barusheho gukora no kubona inyungu.

cropPlanner.title: Gahunda y'Ibihingwa Yihariye
cropPlanner.description: Bona inama zishingiye kuri AI zishingiye ku butaka bwawe, ikirere, n'ibyo isoko risaba kugirango unoze ibyemezo byawe byo gutera.

marketConnection.title: Modire yo Guhuza Isoko
marketConnection.description: Hura n'abaguzi kandi ubone ibiciro by'isoko mu gihe nyacyo kugirango ubone agaciro keza ku musaruro wawe.

harvestTracker.title: Gukurikirana Umusaruro n'Amafaranga
harvestTracker.description: Kurikirana umusaruro wawe, amafaranga yakoreshejwe, n'amafaranga yinjiye ahantu hamwe. Sobanukirwa ubuzima bw'imari bw'umurima wawe mu kanya.

visualInsights.title: Ikibaho cy'Amakuru Agaragara
visualInsights.description: Ibishushanyo byiza n'ibishushanyo bituma amakuru y'umurima akomeye yoroshye gusobanukirwa no gukora.

exportInsights.title: Kohereza no Gusangira Raporo
exportInsights.description: Kora raporo z'umwuga zo gusangira n'abafatanyabikorwa, abatanga inguzanyo, cyangwa ku bijanye nawe.

ctaSection.headline: Witeguye Guhindura Ubuhinzi Bwawe?
ctaSection.subHeadline: Injira mu bahinzi ibihumbi bakoresha Farmlytics kugirango bafate ibyemezo byiza kandi bongere umusaruro wabo.
